titleEn: ChatGPT vs Wenxin: 2025 Chinese LLM Comparison
excerpt: 深度对比两大主流AI大语言模型在中文理解、创作能力、API接口等方面的表现差异，为开发者和企业用户提供选型参考。
excerptEn: In-depth comparison of two mainstream AI language models in Chinese understanding, creative capabilities, API interfaces, providing reference for developers and enterprise users.
author: AI推编辑部

id: sora-video-analysis
title: Sora视频生成技术深度解读：原理与应用前景
titleEn: Sora Video Generation: Technical Deep Dive & Applications
excerpt: 全面解析OpenAI Sora视频生成模型的技术原理、训练方法和实际应用场景，探讨视频AI的未来发展趋势。
excerptEn: Comprehensive analysis of OpenAI Sora video generation model technology, training methods, and application scenarios, exploring future trends in video AI.
author: AI推编辑部

id: china-ai-industry-2025
title: 2025年中国AI产业发展报告：市场规模与投资趋势
titleEn: China AI Industry 2025: Market Scale & Investment Trends

excerptEn: Based on latest statistics, analyzing China AI industry development, market scale, investment hotspots and future opportunities.
author: AI推编辑部

id: ai-medical-applications
title: AI在医疗诊断中的应用现状与未来展望
titleEn: AI in Medical Diagnosis: Current Status & Future Prospects
excerpt: 详细介绍人工智能在医疗影像诊断、病理分析、药物研发等领域的最新应用成果和发展前景。
excerptEn: Detailed introduction to AI applications in medical imaging diagnosis, pathology analysis, drug development and prospects.
author: AI推编辑部

id: ai-regulation-policy

excerptEn: Interpreting latest AI regulatory policies, analyzing algorithm filing requirements and data security impact on AI companies.
author: AI推编辑部
